outcome: An external cyberattack on the BCI disrupts key city functionalities, exposing vulnerabilities.

events.description: A cyberattack disrupts air traffic, causing emergency landings and sparking panic in Stenograd.
Investigators trace the cyberattack back to external rivals seeking to exploit BCI weaknesses.
City-wide infrastructure fails intermittently, cutting power and causing traffic chaos.
An emergency council meeting is held to address the ongoing crisis and plan a response.
